COMPRESSOR.TITLE: Text & Image Compressor
COMPRESSOR.CONTEXT:
This project is from a compulsory subject at Informatics Engineering Bachelor Degree at UPC.

The project consists in document, design, develop, test and deliver a program able to compress/decompress texts and images.
It also has the possibility to compare a file before and after compression/decompression and save global statistics of every compression/decompression.
COMPRESSOR.FEATURES:
- Compress File & Folders: The user can select a file, select the output directory and the compression algorithm to compress it.

 - Decompress File & Folders: The user can select a compressed file, the output directory and it will automatically detect which algorithms use and decompress it.

 - Compare File: The user can select a file to compare, the program will compress and descompress it and show if there are any differences (compression data loss)

 - View Global Statistics: The user can view the global statistics of the selected algorithm.

 - Export Global Statistics: The user can export the global statistics to a txt file.

 - Algorithms: LZ78, LZSS, LZW, JPEG 

 - Help Module: In each feature tab, there's a question mark button that opens a window with an explanation of the feature.
COMPRESSOR.SOLUTION:
The final program is organized in the following folders: 

 - DOCS: Documentation of the project such as Class diagram, Functional requirements and the User's Manual explaining how the program works.
 - EXE: Executable files and Tests suite
 - SRC: Source code of the project.

The source code and the program is based and organized with a Three-tier architecture:

 - Presentation layer: Layer in charge of the user's interactions and displaying information to the user.
 - Application layer: Layer in charge of processing the information.
 - Data layer: Layer in charge of storing and accessing the data of the application. In this case, the database is the computer's hard disk.
